title: Democracy
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery
description: Non-veg turned fully vegetarian coffee shop and cafe as of Jan 2016. Provides a sense of community. One wall is a large chalk board with art and quotes from customers. Offers mostly vegan food, some gluten free choices, including house-made baked goods, breakfast, and sandwiches. Focus is on local and sustainable ingredients. Stocks coconut, almond, and soy milk for drinks.
